articles.author: Russell Contreras
articles.title: Trump to deploy National Guard to Memphis over crime rate - Axios
articles.description: Memphis has the nation's highest violent crime rate of any American city
articles.content:
Driving the news: "We're going to Memphis," Trump told Fox & Friends, calling the city "deeply troubled."
<ul><li>He said the deployment may go beyond the National Guard and could include the Ar… [+3305 chars]
